content:
I do not have access to current statistics or surveys from tourists visiting costa rica. however, based on previous surveys and customer reviews, some of the most popular eco-tourism activities among tourists visiting costa rica are:

1. wildlife tours
2. zip-lining
3. canopy walks
4. volcano tours
5. waterfall and river tours
6. sustainable eco-friendly farms
7. scuba diving and snorkeling
8. surfing and stand-up paddleboarding 

these eco-friendly activities are great ways to explore and experience the natural beauty of costa rica while preserving its environment for future generations.
